senses.sense_definition: An Asian tree, Terminalia elliptica, also known as the Indian laurel, valued for its timber.

examples.text: The carpenter recommended using <w>saj</w> for the door frames because of its durability and resistance to fire.
While hiking through the forests of India, we identified a large <w>saj</w> tree by its characteristic bark resembling crocodile skin.

senses.sense_definition: An alternative spelling of <w>sadge</w>, used to express sadness or disappointment.

examples.text: I really wanted to go to the concert, but the tickets sold out in five minutes, <w>saj</w>.
My favorite streamer just ended the broadcast early, <w>saj</w>.
